website_summaries.verdict: For ladies who want an inexpensive bike that's built to last and provides a comfortable, easygoing ride, this is the hands down best pick by the brand.
pros: The ideal bike for leisure cycling, as it sports a classic style for easy riding and suspension fork for excellent shock absorption
Has 21 speeds and a step-through frame
cons: Assembly instructions lack details, which is especially confusing when it comes to adjusting the brakes

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great Bike... Easy to put together but DO look at the video on-line and DO read the assembly instructions first. This is the first quick release front tire I've worked with and it took me a while to realize that you don't loosen the nuts on the wheel to put it on the bike, you insert the quick release gizmo through the wheel. Solid Bike, looks great and a joy to ride from my daughter. Even the seat is comfortable for her. NOTE: We did buy a kick-stand for this bike as it does not come with one. That seems strange to me.
customer_reviews.author: Peter V

customer_reviews.title: I love this bike
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike! I stand 5'3" and found this bike to be the perfect fit frame wise. Lightweight with handlebars that keep you more upright when riding.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Robles

customer_reviews.title: Rides beautifully. Shifts beautifully
customer_reviews.text: It is just what I wanted. It arrived safely, and my husband put it together in about 30 minutes. Rides beautifully. Shifts beautifully. I especially like the 'granny' gear for steep hills. Very, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Bike - Minor issues
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality bike. I bought it for my wife who is 5' 6" and the described fit for her height was perfect. The only problems I have are with a dificult time getting the brakes adjusted just right and the pedals are very slippery. I had to replace the pedals with a pair that had some grip.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate size description
customer_reviews.text: Website states the 17/WMD is for riders 5’5”-5’8” yet the bike arrived clearly marked for riders 5’7-5’10”. Disappointed since I am just 5’5” and it looks huge.
customer_reviews.author: M. Durkin

customer_reviews.title: Value buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike for the price point. Super Value. Quality parts and materials. One little nut was missing on the brake adjustment apparatus. No sweat we fount a bike light with the same size. Adjust everything after assembly.
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great bike. Pros
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. Pros: Relatively lightweight due to aluminum frame (Total weight 31 lbs) Cons: Out of the box, it took quite a while to tune and true the wheels. I bought this as a backup for my wife. I would recommend this bike to anyone, but please take it to a bike mechanic for tuning. The breaks and wheels needed a lot of work.
customer_reviews.author: Sonnet L. Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Ride!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is the perfect design and rides very smoothe! Gears are very easy to change. Very easy to get on and off because of the low crossbar. Only thing is I changed out the seat for a wider one.
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, fits wife perfectly. Easy assembly and only minor adjustments required on derailleurs and brakes.
customer_reviews.author: Huts

customer_reviews.title: Missing break pad
customer_reviews.text: Bike not that hard to put together.It was missing front brake pad like another reviewer stated. I call amazon direct and they gave me credit for another brake pad on amazon.. The bike comes with terrible directions but not that difficult to figure out. It feels smooth and comfortable. I bought it for my daughter. worth the money. Waiting on front break pad to install.
customer_reviews.author: Crom777

customer_reviews.title: Best bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike was light, well packed and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: If I could give more stars I would. Absolutely NO complaints. I am 4'11 inches and am glad I didn't go with the smaller size. I love this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Cookeylady

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Took a little thinking to assemble but it's a great ride. Gears are smooth. Like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little bike.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike for my teenage daughter. She loved the color. But it gives her a upright comfortable sitting position and works very well. It is not a high end bike, but the components work fine for her and should last for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: M F

customer_reviews.title: but my teenage son tried it few times and he's been very satisfied with the quality and comfortable ride
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my wife, but my teenage son tried it few times and he's been very satisfied with the quality and comfortable ride.
customer_reviews.author: TomH

customer_reviews.title: Minor complaint
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my wife in the spring of 2017, easy to put together. Only complaint is the derailleur was broken. Still haven't gotten it fixed.i tried when when I found out, but it was more of a hassle, then to just live with it, but the bike looks and feels great
customer_reviews.author: Heriberto Urbina

customer_reviews.title: Best bike I ever rode
customer_reviews.text: Best bike I ever rode. Smooth ride. Really low gear for hills. Almost sit up straight seating. Easy to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: stan

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bike is great have arthritis in both my knees, step thru design makes for easy on and off. Bike rides very smoothly, ease of shifting thru gears, husband had no problem assembling
customer_reviews.author: Luck

customer_reviews.title: It's a great bike, but the instructions were a bit difficult ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bike, but the instructions were a bit difficult to interpret. I will have to take it to a bike shop to calibrate. But then, I'm not a rocket scientist, or even an engineer....but I'm generally handy with mechanical things.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Good bike for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bike for over two years and I ride it most days. It works well and is comfortable. I had to get new tires one time. I recommend this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Rear rim out-of-round
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike for the money. Assembly was straight forward. Just have to install seat post, front rim, and handle bar post. Also have to finish set-up of brakes once handle bar is installed. Gears worked perfectly with no adjustment required. Only complaint is that rear rim was out of round, so had significant wobble, which made set-up of rear brake difficult. Had to adjust spokes to reduce the wobble to acceptable level, but still not perfect Front rim did not require adjustment. Would not recommend purchase unless have experience with this type of issue, or know someone who can help. Not worth the hassle of sending back for this issue, since no guarantee a replacement would be any better.
customer_reviews.author: 5560mc

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves this bike.
customer_reviews.text: Needed adjustment. Good quality for light to moderate use. If you are not familiar with bike repair it may be worth taking to a bike shop. If you are a DIY this is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Thrilled to be here.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bicycle by mail
customer_reviews.text: This was a real surprise. A very well made and easy to put together addition to our bicycles. Gears work great, great seat. Would expect nothing less from Diamondback.
customer_reviews.author: TOMTHEATOMBOMB

customer_reviews.title: Beauty
customer_reviews.text: I love my bike, and now have used it more with Covid-19. I can get out and not worry about running and talking to people just a wave and a Hello!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bike! Beautiful color, nice ride, comfortable seat and handle bars!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the shorter ladies.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this bike! It's light and easy to ride, and fits a short person just right.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new bike. Let's you ride upright and comfortable. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a great comfort bike. My fiancee loves it !!!
customer_reviews.author: TSaxGuy

customer_reviews.title: but not bad enough to return it
customer_reviews.text: One wheel was a little out of round, but not bad enough to return it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my new bike - it's so much lighter than my other one, makes it easier to pedal.
customer_reviews.author: Denise N.

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable bike
customer_reviews.text: I assembled them myself in about an hour and I use them almost every day. That are great and not very heavy. I got the medium size and I'm 5'4 and it's works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike but need better assembly instructions!
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice color and bike! The main problem was the lack of good directions so we had to take the bike to a bike shop to get the brakes adjusted! No problems once the brakes were adjusted just had to pay more to the bike shop due to bad brake instructions!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Holtz

customer_reviews.title: which as been a great bike. It is considerably lighter than the old ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bike for my wife to replace her 20 year old Diamondback Wildwood, which as been a great bike. It is considerably lighter than the old bike and takes less effort to pedal. She hasn't had much chance to ride it yet, but I'm pretty sure she's going to love it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Koch

customer_reviews.title: How do you disassemble an entire bike, repackage it and send it back?
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to receive my bicycle but was truly disappointed that the brakes were missing an essential component. What a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Chaya Grant

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Instructions could be more clear
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bicycle based on the stellar reviews. BUT, I'm guessing those folks have put bikes together in the past. The "assembly" instructions that come with this bike are terrible. They assume you've assembled a bike before. Other reviews made it seem simple to assemble, but all I see are tons of parts all over the place with no instructions on how to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Mocha

customer_reviews.title: Rides well
customer_reviews.text: Minor paint damage when it arrived. To date no resolution. Rides well and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful blue bicycle. Handles great, has cool pedals and grips, and affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I bought size 15 and it fits me well. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought size 15 and it fits me well. Simple assembly and the maker also have very helpful videos in their website. The bike first arrived with a missing component for the brakes but I reached out to Diamondback Customer Service and they sent me a new pair of brakes in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Carolina Boraschi

product_meta.title: Diamondback Bicycles Women's Serene Classic Frame Comfort Bike
product_meta.description: The pleasure of a bike ride has remained unchanged through the years, and the serene Classic's sole purpose is to help you achieve that feeling. Riding this bike is as simple as it gets: its aluminum step-thru frame is easy to get on and off safely, and it puts you in a familiar, upright riding position. A suspension fork and seat post work with a plush seat, ergonomic grips, and an adjustable stem to offer one of the most comfortable rides you can find. Shimano easy fire Shifters click through 21 gears, with an extended range on the low end for climbing hills. Wide tires and powerful brakes add a level of predictability and traction to the ride, making the serene classic the perfect choice for the casual bike path rider.
feature_bullets: Aluminum alloy frame is light yet built to last
Comfort geometry for perfect pedaling position
Suspension fork and seat post for added cushioning
Shimano 21-speed drivetrain provides wide range of gears
Step-thru frame makes getting on and off easy and unintimidating

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
